casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Shiloh POLANCO. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 29, 2016.

Peter G. Billings, New Haven, in support of the petition.

Jonathan M. Sousa, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 563, 140 A.3d 230 (2016), is denied.
